definitions.definition: A male given name from Ancient Greek .

The son of Laertes and Anticlea and father of Telemachus . A Greek leader during the Trojan War , he was responsible for the Trojan horse . He was also king of Ithaca , hero of the Iliad and protagonist of the Odyssey .

main_definition: A male given name from Ancient Greek .
secondary_definitions: ( Greek mythology ) The son of Laertes and Anticlea and father of Telemachus . A Greek leader during the Trojan War , he was responsible for the Trojan horse . He was also king of Ithaca , hero of the Iliad and protagonist of the Odyssey .
